page.title: 11Tairmeibion Farm
page.content: Mr.Williams has about nine hundred breeding ewes and 39 breeding rams. This year (1985) his lambing percentage was 135%. He also keeps 108 Fresian milking cows at about 2 years 6 months old. To control his stock, he has five sheep dogs, which he uses to move his sheep from one field to the next. A new milking parlour has just been built. It is a modern system called herring bone because it is spaced out and shaped like one. There is a pit in between the two rows of milking equipment and it makes the men's jobs much easier.
